data.text: @tapas321 @AlastairGrant4 Yes Alistair, do us all a favour and forget about this nonsense now. Literally no one cares and no one should have cared
@AlastairGrant4 @fascinatorfun The fall in my district has slowed and today turned up.

@_WillPenning Some of the fall in reported cases will certainly be caused by reduced testing. This will get even worse when free testing for the general public stops. 
Even with that going on, reported cases in older people are declining only slowly. Actual infections in 80+ may be flat. https://t.co/X4W306t2oz

@AlastairGrant4 I'd forget about dashboard now Alastair, admissions would be dropping quicker if dashboard case data was correct. I expect ONS infection data to show either a small drop or plateau tomorrow & next week.
@AlastairGrant4 iâ€™m assuming this could also be because of the dramatic decrease in testing recently.
